name: PROCEDURE / INSTRUCTION - Ensure Permits are in place including, but not limited to:
VERIFYING DOCUMENT - Working Party to have access and sign onto permits where required.
PROCEDURE / INSTRUCTION - Use of DBYD and other methods to positively identify underground services.
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - Engineer to verify DBYD
VERIFYING DOCUMENT - DBYD / Excavation Permit Survey (if required)
PROCEDURE / INSTRUCTION - Submission, review, and approval of all SWMS for the works
PROCEDURE / INSTRUCTION - All delivered materials and procured items conform to project specifications and IFC drawings.
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - As per Drawings and specifications
1.5 - Inspection Measuring and Test Equipment (IMTE) Registers
PROCEDURE / INSTRUCTION - Supply of all calibration certificates to the engineer including but not limited to:
2.1 - Survey and set out of piles
PROCEDURE / INSTRUCTION - Mark the ground in accordance with Schletter pile location
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - Visual as per Schletter pile location spreadsheet.
VERIFYING DOCUMENT - Survey As Constructed record
PROCEDURE / INSTRUCTION - Distribute colour coded piles, dimensions, and length into allocated location
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - Visual. Piles distributed as per Schletter drawings i.e., correct colour code, dimensions, and length.
VERIFYING DOCUMENT - Survey As Constructed record
PROCEDURE / INSTRUCTION - Drive piles to depth until it reached point of refusal.
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - Record pile location and mark on the drawing
○ Pile refusal in accordance with Pile Refusal Procedure
○ Piles cut and holes drilled as per Schletter documentation
○ ITC Data Tracker Excel Pile Monitoring Sheet
PROCEDURE / INSTRUCTION - Install pile on correct location as per Schletter drawing
○ Install pile within the design tolerances
○ Piles should have no damage or deformation and in correct orientation
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - Tolerances as per Schletter Installation Manual Section 7.2 Installation Tolerances:
○ Height difference foundation posts within one row: ±50mm
○ Piles have no damage deformation and in correct orientation.
○ ITC Data Tracker Excel Pile Monitoring Sheet
○ Pile(s) marked on the As- Constructed drawing/Red Line Mark-up
PROCEDURE / INSTRUCTION - Use two coats of zinc rich galvanising paint on damage, deform, and top of piles
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - Galvanising repaired as per manufacturer’s recommendation and procedure.
2.6 - As Constructed records – Red Line Mark-Up (RLMU) Drawings
PROCEDURE / INSTRUCTION - Engineer to compile and record changes on IFC Drawings, to be issued to Client .
PROCEDURE / INSTRUCTION - Development of punch list with PM/CM and/or Supervisor
ACCEPTANCE CRITERIA - Punchlist closed in a timely manner
PROCEDURE / INSTRUCTION - 100% visual verification required for each pile upon ITP sign off
